name: E.R. (2020) Costa Rica Pura Vida
additionalNotes:
Numbered slide lid box of 10 cigars (6,000 produced).
A 2020 release. Released late-2021.
An unknown number of these cigars were erroneously released with H. Upmann bands.

https://www.cubancigarwebsite.com/cigar/saint-luis-rey/edicion-regional-costa-rica
